messages.message: Hi Priya! :) Got your request, happy to connect. Your profile caught my eye â€” pediatrician with a love for cooking & classical music... super rare combo tbh ğŸ˜„
Haha thank u Rajesh! Honestly your headline made me smile... 'software engineer with traditional values' is kinda wholesome ğŸ˜…
ğŸ˜‚ Yeah, bit old-school I guess. Blame it on my momâ€™s sanskar overload ğŸ˜…. So how's work at Apollo? Must be hectic with lil ones?
Hectic is an understatement lol. 12hr shifts and surprise tantrums daily ğŸ¥² but honestly I love it. Kids are brutally honest but also adorable.
Haha sounds like a mix of joy & chaos! I'm in Bangalore rn â€” remote mostly, so flexible hours. Used to the chaos too tho â€” lived in IIT Delhi hostel for 4 yrs ğŸ˜µâ€ğŸ’«
Oh wow IITD ğŸ‘ğŸ‘ smart & sorted huh? What kinda stuff do you work on?
Haha not always sorted, trust me ğŸ˜…. I work as Sr. Engineer at Tech Mahindra â€” mostly backend systems + some cloud infra (AWS certified squad ğŸš€)
Cloud things go over my head tbh ğŸ˜… but backend sounds v important. Also cool that you're in Bangalore! I love that city. Was there last year for a CMEs conference.
Next time you're here lemme treat you to some filter coffee â˜• + Dosa trail at VV Puram ğŸ˜„
Haha deal! Iâ€™m a sucker for South Indian food ğŸ˜ esp crispy ghee roast ğŸ˜‹ btw are you a full veg too? Just curious
Yesss pure veg ğŸš«ğŸ—. Born and raised that way, never tempted to switch. You?
Same ğŸ™Œ been veg all my life. And I cook a lot too â€“ sometimes do mini experiments with Gujarati fusion. Made khichdi sushi once ğŸ˜…
Khichdi sushi?? That's peak desi innovation ğŸ˜‚ plz open a food truck, I'd be your first investor. Also... tell me you're into cricket too and not just music ğŸ˜
Lmaoo I *am* into cricket but I support RCB so... emotional damage ğŸ¥²ğŸ¥²
RCB fan? Ok now it's destiny ğŸ˜‚ Bangalore+Veg+Cricket = good signs from the universe ğŸŒŒ
Haha true dat! On a serious note â€” I liked how your profile mentioned respecting both traditions and modernity. That balance is so rare these days.
Thanks ğŸ™ I really believe both can coexist. Like... I wanna support my partnerâ€™s career just like I saw my dad support my mom all her life. What about you â€” what do you look for?
That's beautiful ğŸ§¡ For me, honesty + emotional maturity matter most. Someone who doesn't feel threatened by an ambitious woman, yâ€™know?
100% agree. A real partner lifts you up, not compete. Also... I donâ€™t see ambition as a threat. Itâ€™s inspiring ğŸ’ª
Glad to hear that ğŸ˜Š Btw, random q â€” do you like pets? I have two cats, they're basically my kids ğŸ±ğŸ±
I LOVE pets!! Grew up with a labrador named Simba ğŸ¶ Total softie. If we ever meet, your cats might mistake me for a live scratching post ğŸ˜…
Hahaha Simba sounds adorable! Okay this convo made me laugh a lot. Thank you ğŸ™
Same here Priya. I feel we got some really good vibes going ğŸ™‚ Hope we keep chatting and see where this goes
